alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 11 at 7:13PM MDT until May 14 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Nepesta affecting Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet zone. Arkansas River At La Junta affecting La Junta Vicinity/Otero County zone. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Nepesta, La Junta... flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Arkansas River Near Nepesta. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Moderate Flood. Agricultural lands near Nepesta flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 315 AM MDT.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
